Topic.Title: (yet another) Haunted House game just released!

Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone! I've just uploaded here my Haunted House (an interactive fiction remix) game. It's sort of a remake of a 1979 game, with some new plot and characters roaming around an scenario based on the original work. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/xr1sot90wecdvv6o-ecd2a/haunted-house More info about its (rather long :-) ) creation process at my blog: https://lineadura.wordpress.com/2017/05/14/haunted-house-goes-public/ ...and in the booklet that comes with the game (sort of a "feelie") you can read at: http://www.rockersuke.com/if/hauntedhousei7/IntroductionToHH.pdf Hope you like it! :-)
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone!
I've just uploaded here my Haunted House (an interactive fiction remix) game.
It's sort of a remake of a 1979 game, with some new plot and characters roaming around an scenario based on the original work.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/xr1sot90wecdvv6o-ecd2a/haunted-house

More info about its (rather long :-) ) creation process at my blog:

https://lineadura.wordpress.com/2017/05/14/haunted-house-goes-public/

...and in the booklet that comes with the game (sort of a "feelie") you can read at:

http://www.rockersuke.com/if/hauntedhousei7/IntroductionToHH.pdf

Hope you like it! :-)
